name: Post View Count Editor
author: Andrea Marinucci

sections.description: Add a Metabox in post edit page that shows the current Post View Count and let you to update the value.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the file and upload the entire post-view-editor folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In the edit post page you will see on the right side a box ‘Post View Count Editor’
  4. Change the Value in the box and update the post as normal update !!
sections.faq:
Do it works with any post type ( events, books etc)?

Yes
sections.changelog:
